name: Like the Diabell
effectText: If a Spell/Trap(s) is sent to the GY by a card effect: Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or GY, but it cannot be activated this turn. During your Main Phase: You can banish 3 Spells/Traps from your GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Diabell" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Like the Diabell" once per turn.
